bibl.title: Collegia in the Province of Egypt in the First Century AD. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Explores the apparent discrepancy between the Roman legislation on collegia and the documentation on associations. - 1. Legal background. - 2. The testimony of Philo (In Flaccum, 4). - 3. The epigraphical and papyrological evidence. - 4. Gnomon of the Idios Logos § 108. - Pp. 213-216: Appendices 1-2: Documentary evidence for associations in the late first century BC and the first century AD.
